EmailTemplate.description: Quarterly survey to get partner feedback & NPS - Updated 2018
EmailTemplate.name: 18-03 Quarterly Partner Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: BlueWave needs your input on future offerings
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Help us help you.
We constantly strive to bring you the best partner experience. Help us serve you better by completing this brief survey: https://www.getfeedback.com/r/6nOG8T31.
To thank you for your time, all survey respondents have the option of entering into a raffle for a $100 Visa gift card!
We will be following up with you on a quarterly basis to ensure you receive the support that you need as we continue to work together to help customers go solar. Questions? Call: (888) 817-2703 Email: PartnerSupport@bluewavesolar.com
Thank you!
- BlueWave Partner Support
